options.name: Beginner Auger
options.description: You can research Beginner Level Auguration Spells and gain +1 Power.

options.name: Reaction : Rewind
options.description: At any point during your turn, you can use a Reaction to revert your last Action, refunding any resources that were used and any Health that was lost.

options.name: Fate Avoided
options.description: Any time you roll a 1 on a Skill Check, roll a d4. If the result is a 4, treat the original 1 as a 12 instead.

options.name: Novice Auger
options.description: You can research Novice Level Auguration Spells, gain +1 Spell Attack and +2 Power.

options.name: Journeyman Auger
options.description: You can research Journeyman Level Druidic Spells, gain +5 Power and +1 Physical Mitigation

options.name: Action : Split Fate
options.description: The next Auguration Spell that you Channel before the end of your next turn that targets one Creature targets an additional Creature within range but costs double the Power.

options.name: Visions in the Night
options.description: When you complete a Full Rest with that you started with Full Health, you have dreams about possible futures and omens. When you wake, you roll a 1d12 Omen Dice which will affect your Crafting Checks and Skill Checks, with the exception of Defense and Attack Rolls. On a 1, your Checks suffer a 1d4 Penalty until the end of your next Full Rest. On a 9 or higher, they receive a 1d4 Bonus.

options.name: Expert Auger
options.description: You can research Expert Level Auguration Spells, gain +8 Power, +1 Spell Attack and +1 Spell Damage

options.name: Free Action [Daily] : Reality Surge
options.description: Whenever you would take your next Action, gain 1d4 Actions instead. When you roll a 4, you gain 1 Tier of Exhaustion after the Actions end.

options.name: Echoes of the Past
options.description: When you handle Objects, you can identify any magical properties on them just by touching them. Additionally, if you spend 1 Hour interacting with an Object you can pick up echoes that grant more information about the item such as its history, previous owners or lore associated with it.

options.name: Master Auger
options.description: You can research Master Level Auguration Spells, gain +10 Power, +1 Spell Attack and +1 Resistance. Additionally, you can research or learn Grand Master Auguration Spells at level 13.
